Getting Started¶

Requirements¶

MacroDensity is intended to be relatively dependency free. However, some of the features require other packages.

  • Python 3
  • Matplotlib (only required for interactive plotting features).
  • Atomic Simulation Environment (only required for reading Gaussian cube files and for atom centred averaging).
  • Pandas (can speed up I/O of files significantly).

Installation¶

MacroDensity can be installed directly using pip.

pip install git+git://github.com/WMD-group/MacroDensity.git

You should now be able to import MacroDensity to your own Python scripts.

import macrodensity as md

For examples of how to use MacroDensity for common tasks see our tutorials.
